Class FESI.Data.ConstructedFunctionObject 

FESI.Data.ESValue
   |
   +----FESI.Data.ESObject
           |
           +----FESI.Data.FunctionPrototype
                   |
                   +----FESI.Data.ConstructedFunctionObject
public class ConstructedFunctionObject
extends FunctionPrototype
Implements functions constructed from source text

callFunction(ESObject, ESValue[])
Call a function object - not implemented for default objecr
doConstruct(ESObject, ESValue[])
Call the constructor - not implemented on default object
getFunctionImplementationString()
get the string defining the function
getFunctionParametersString()
Get the function parameter description as a string
getLocalVariableNames()
Get the list of local variables of the function as a vector
getProperty(String, int)
Get the property by name (see 8.6.2.1) propagating to the prototype if required
getPropertyInScope(String, ScopeChain, int)
Either return the property value of the specified property in the current object, or lookup the next object in the scope chain if there is one.
hasProperty(String, int)
makeNewConstructedFunction(Evaluator, String, EvaluationSource, String, String[], Vector, ASTStatementList)
Utility function to create a function object.
putProperty(String, ESValue, int)
Put the property by name (see 8.6.2.2), ignoring if read only (integrate functionality of canPut) and creating it if needed and possible.
toDetailString()
Returns a detailed description of the value, intended for debugging.
toString()

toDetailString in class ESObject
makeNewConstructedFunction 
 public static ConstructedFunctionObject makeNewConstructedFunction(Evaluator evaluator,
                                                                    String functionName,
                                                                    EvaluationSource evaluationSource,
                                                                    String sourceString,
                                                                    String arguments[],
                                                                    Vector localVariableNames,
                                                                    ASTStatementList aFunctionAST)
Utility function to create a function object. Used by the EcmaScript Function function to create new functions

Parameters:
evaluator - the Evaluator
functionName - the name of the new function
evaluationSource - An identification of the source of the function
sourceString - The source of the parsed function
arguments - The array of arguments
localVariableNames - the list of local variable declared by var
aFunctionAST - the parsed function
Returns:
A new function object
getPropertyInScope 
 public ESValue getPropertyInScope(String propertyName,
                                   ScopeChain previousScope,
                                   int hash) throws EcmaScriptException
Either return the property value of the specified property in the current object, or lookup the next object in the scope chain if there is one.
